entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 70 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
